data: The following information is from the American Association of Poison Control Centers (AAPCC). The United States National Poison Hotline is 1-800-222-1222. When you call this number you will be automatically linked to the nearest poison center in the United States. Call this number 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to talk to a poison expert. Call 911 or your local emergency number right away. Call 1-800-222-1222 Get to fresh air right away. Call 1-800-222-1222 Take off any clothing that the poison touched. Rinse skin with running water for 15 to 20 minutes. Call 1-800-222-1222 Rinse eyes with running water for 15 to 20 minutes. Call 1-800-222-1222 We recommend that you print out a hard copy of this number and place it near your home/business phone(s) for easy access in a poison emergency.
title: Poison Control Centers
